initResponse:
Welcome to Bare Necessities, a service that connects buyers to wholesale farmers.

Reply SEARCH <product name>, <town/city> to search for products near you.

Example: SEARCH passion fruit, Eldoret

Reply EXIT, if you would like to quit the service.
searchResultsResponse: Here is a list of farmers with your desired product:
noVendorsFound:
There were no farmers found selling your desired product.
Reply NEW to search a different product.
searchResultsInstructions:
Reply MORE <farmer number> if you would like to see more details from this farmer.
Example: MORE 1

Reply BACK, if you would like to return to the previous step.
Reply EXIT, if you would like to quit using the service.
vendorListResults:
Here are the results that best match your location and products
Reply with your selected farmers number to see more information. 

Text EXIT, if you would like to quit using the service.
exit: Thank you for using Bare Necessities! We hope you enjoyed using our service.
unrecognizedResponse:
We could not recognize your input either due to formatting or unrecognized user input. 
Please resend your response.
resetMessage:
Reply NEW, if you would like to search a new product.
Reply BACK, if you would like to return to the previous step.
Reply EXIT, if you would like to quit the service.
